title: Partisan Gerrymandering In Wisconsin
description: Is partisan gerrymandering illegal? In the second installment of our gerrymandering series we look at a Supreme Court case that could reshape how we draw political boundaries.

itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Galen Druke
itunes:subtitle: Is partisan gerrymandering illegal? In the second installment of our gerrymandering series we look at a Supreme Court case that could reshape how we draw political boundaries.
